project_path.DarkHorse: contracts/DarkHorse Standart Smart Contract Security Audit/DarkHorse

findings.title: Out of gas in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
